name: One Step At A Time
description:
A game by Ima Esiere.

One Step At A Time is a vertical platforming game, gravity and other obstacles about managing productivity while tackling bouts of fatigue, burnout, or mental illness. 

You are in a constant battle against any mental adversary of your choosing: depression, burnout, fatigue, or exhaustion. In the game, these are translated most obviously into gravity—one slip can cost the player some, most, or even all of the progress they’ve made.
